CustomField.description:
Unique external Id for the asset.
format: {prefix}-{product code}-{increment}
prefix: the prefix depends on the record type mapping is as follow Graphic card > GC Processor > CPU Motherboard > MB Other > O
Product code: value of the field ProductCode from the Product2 Object
Increment: an incremental number in this form {00000}, for each asset, with the same prefix and product code, this number should be increased by one.
CustomField.label: External Id
